# iru_user (Data Source)

Get details for a specific user.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iru_user" "example" {
  id = "your-user-uuid"
}

output "user_email" {
  value = data.iru_user.example.email
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) The unique identifier for the User.

### Read-Only

- `email` (String)
- `is_archived` (Boolean)
- `name` (String)
